mapper.sql: a.batch_no AS batchNo , a.file_count AS fileCount , a.rev_time AS revTime
mapper.select:
select
from s_batch_rev_t a
AND a.batch_no like '%${batchNo}%'
AND to_date(a.rev_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mi:ss') between to_date(#{search_satrt},'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mi:ss') and to_date(#{search_end},' yyyy-MM-dd hh:mi:ss')
